title: ace your test Uber Analytics test
description:
Pack content :

Interview guide 

2 csv files

Set of 32 analytical questions with detailed solutions (screenshots, smart formulas etc.). The Pack is updated as of January 2016

Many Excel tips to save some precious time during the real test

Extra questions and insight based on customers feedback

_________________________________________________________

CONTENT OVERVIEW

1. History and key figures

Impress your interviewer by knowing Uber's history, business model, level of funding, key execs and key metrics.

2. Know the app!

Pretty obvious right? Best way to standout is to know the product!

3. Speak their langage

What is Eyeballs, Zeroes, Surge Pricing? Shine and save some precious time during the test by knowing your vocabulary! 

4. The recruitment process

Get insight on the recruitment process. 

5. Ace the analytical test

In order to beat the test we have created a whole new set of materials : 2 CSV files and 32 questions inspired by what we saw during the test. We are sharing all the tips and best practices to help you ace it. Developing your skills rather than memorizing answers is the best way to succeed.

6. Internet marketing - Thoughts on acquisition

Uber success mainly relies on its ability to scale both supply and demand. In order to grow that fast you need to have an outstanding acquisition strategy : web & mobile acquisition + old school acquisition tricks.

7. Considerations on the on-demand economy

Contractor vs. employee issue, Homejoy, Uber Drivers class action - Everything you need to know about the pros and cons of the sharing economy and legal threats to the business model.

8. Extra questions

Extra questions asked during either the 2h analytics test or the expedited version of the test. Key concepts covered : probability, opposite events, business modeling etc
